Beans.name: Beans
Beans.desc: Nutrient-rich vegetable crop with steady demand. Grows well in warm climates.

Bitter Gourd.name: Bitter Gourd (Karela)
Bitter Gourd.desc: Medicinal vegetable valued for its health benefits. Requires warm and humid conditions.

Bottle Gourd.name: Bottle Gourd (Lauki)
Bottle Gourd.desc: Popular summer vegetable with high consumer demand and strong market supply.

Brinjal.name: Brinjal (Eggplant)
Brinjal.desc: Widely grown vegetable crop with multiple varieties and strong year-round demand.

Cabbage.name: Cabbage
Cabbage.desc: Cool-season leafy vegetable that yields well in winter climates.

Capsicum.name: Capsicum (Bell Pepper)
Capsicum.desc: High-value vegetable cultivated widely, especially near urban markets.

Carrot.name: Carrot
Carrot.desc: Root vegetable rich in nutrition, mainly cultivated in cool seasons.

Cauliflower.name: Cauliflower
Cauliflower.desc: Highly consumed winter vegetable requiring proper temperature control.

Green Chilli.name: Green Chilli
Green Chilli.desc: Widely consumed spicy vegetable with strong year-round demand.

Onion.name: Onion
Onion.desc: Essential household vegetable with high price volatility across seasons.

Potato.name: Potato
Potato.desc: High-consumption tuber crop with strong market and processing demand.

Pumpkin.name: Pumpkin
Pumpkin.desc: Long-shelf-life vegetable with stable market demand.

Spinach.name: Spinach
Spinach.desc: Highly nutritious leafy vegetable harvested frequently.

Tinda.name: Tinda (Indian Round Gourd)
Tinda.desc: Popular summer vegetable grown mainly in North India.

Tomato.name: Tomato
Tomato.desc: High-demand vegetable with seasonal price fluctuations.

rice.name: Rice
rice.desc: Staple grain crop ideal for flooded conditions and high humidity.

wheat.name: Wheat
wheat.desc: Winter cereal crop requiring moderate water and cooler temperatures.

maize.name: Maize
maize.desc: Versatile crop thriving in warm conditions with moderate rainfall.

cotton.name: Cotton
cotton.desc: Cash crop requiring warm climate and adequate water supply.

jute.name: Jute
jute.desc: Fiber crop thriving in hot, humid conditions with heavy rainfall.

coconut.name: Coconut
coconut.desc: Tropical crop requiring high rainfall and warm temperatures.

papaya.name: Papaya
papaya.desc: Fast-growing fruit crop for tropical and subtropical regions.

orange.name: Orange
orange.desc: Citrus crop requiring moderate climate and well-drained soil.

apple.name: Apple
apple.desc: Temperate fruit requiring cold winters and moderate summers.

muskmelon.name: Muskmelon
muskmelon.desc: Warm-season melon requiring moderate water and sunshine.

watermelon.name: Watermelon
watermelon.desc: Summer fruit crop thriving in hot, sunny conditions.

grapes.name: Grapes
grapes.desc: Premium fruit requiring specific climate and soil conditions.

mango.name: Mango
mango.desc: King of fruits, thriving in tropical and subtropical climates.

banana.name: Banana
banana.desc: Year-round tropical fruit requiring high moisture and warmth.

pomegranate.name: Pomegranate
pomegranate.desc: Drought-tolerant fruit crop for semi-arid regions.

coffee.name: Coffee
coffee.desc: Tropical crop requiring shade, altitude, and consistent rainfall.

chickpea.name: Chickpea
chickpea.desc: Protein-rich pulse crop for cooler, drier conditions.

kidneybeans.name: Kidney Beans
kidneybeans.desc: Legume crop requiring moderate climate and well-drained soil.

pigeonpeas.name: Pigeon Peas
pigeonpeas.desc: Drought-resistant pulse crop for semi-arid regions.

mothbeans.name: Moth Beans
mothbeans.desc: Hardy legume adapted to arid and semi-arid conditions.

mungbean.name: Mung Bean
mungbean.desc: Quick-growing pulse crop for warm, humid conditions.

blackgram.name: Black Gram
blackgram.desc: Protein-rich pulse for warm, humid climates.

lentil.name: Lentil
lentil.desc: Cool-season pulse crop requiring moderate water.
